mapper.insert: insert into t_output (outputId, outputEquipment, outputSgelf, outputProName, outputTime, outputPlace, outputMan) values (#{outputId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{outputEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputSgelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputProName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outputPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outputMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_output set outputEquipment = #{outputEquipment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outputSgelf = #{outputSgelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outputProName = #{outputProName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outputTime = #{outputTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, outputPlace = #{outputPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, outputMan = #{outputMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where outputId = #{outputId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select outputId, outputEquipment, outputSgelf, outputProName, outputTime, outputPlace, outputMan from t_output where outputId = #{outputId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select outputId, outputEquipment, outputSgelf, outputProName, outputTime, outputPlace, outputMan from t_output
